welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Montegiardino, the charming and picturesque city of San Marino! Get ready to experience the rich history and culture of our city, known for its stunning architecture and breathtaking views. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Montegiardino has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miramare Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Miramare Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luigi Ridolfi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to low-cost airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
